This token is non-transferable."}},"notice":"The CreditManager contract is an ERC20 token that represents signature credits for  the OpenSig protocol. Credits are non-transferable, indivisible and are used to pay for  signature requests - one credit per signature.  Credits are minted by authorized suppliers and are burned when a user deregisters from the OpenSig system. "]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xddce8e17e3d3f9ed818b4f4c4478a8262aab8b11ed322f1bf5ed705bb4bd97fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8084aa71a4cc7d2980972412a88fe4f114869faea3fefa5436431644eb5c0287","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbqfs5dRdPvHVKY8kTaeyc65NdqXRQwRK7h9s5UJEhD1p"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"src/credits/CreditManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa0ccffba9e3e670cd52fbbb620897608d1cdf3c2a40eb7af27964df836cd575e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://695387e6085796ad86d99e91c9aae88c5b27ce9fbb4b3694468fdc9c23be4fd2","dweb:/ipfs/QmW9RnUM9Zmy3jGzruPEuKWBTJxSLJLMvGzQv2zjePevFa"]},"src/interfaces/ICreditManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9677c7820cfb4679241cc071a2411ea83e2da565bdbaacbe24b65e5260d631e9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://cdcb8caa8874819d8381cf14806e6f7f37da90b8d4013938e674265b82e27652","dweb:/ipfs/QmYbcFTqvUh7634hXN9qDM88S7haEC4VKvT9ewSa8WmPAn"]},"src/interfaces/IUserRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x18f1670b825fc9242f25c4844eadf6f65cb5d6440943e47b2e6531752446d6a1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e3c8e38bb64ca0285dc97536d3aa6dfd02e51af040002c33aac7b8133d5f87f8","dweb:/ipfs/QmaV7JFRH6BBMUZXR5t5vckrjFERHYYSodU3wC1XrjEx9w"]}},"version":1}

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the value of tokens owned by `account`.

burnAll().details: Burns all tokens from the sender's account, decreasing the total supply. Designed to be called by the user's wallet after the user deregisters. Emits a {Transfer} event with `to` set to the zero address. Emits an {AccountBurned} event with the amount burned.

burnClosedAccount(address).details: Burns all tokens from a deregistered (closed) account, decreasing the total supply. Only callable by an authorized burner. Emits a {Transfer} event with `to` set to the zero address. Emits an {AccountBurned} event with the amount burned.

decimals().details: Returns the decimals places of the token.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

mint(address,uint256,bytes32).details: Mints `value` amount of tokens and assigns them to `account`, increasing the total supply. Only callable by an authorized minter. Emits a {Transfer} event with `from` set to the zero address.

mintAll((address,uint256,bytes32)[]).details: Mints `value` amount of tokens and assigns them to `account` for each entry in `mints`. Only callable by an authorized minter. Emits a {Transfer} event for each with `from` set to the zero address.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

spend(address,uint256).details: Spends (burns) credits from the sender's account. Only callable by an authorized  paymaster contract. Emits a {Transfer} event with `from` set to the zero address.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().details: Returns the value of tokens in existence.

allowance(address,address).notice: Not supported. This token is non-transferable.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Not supported. This token is non-transferable.

opensigUserRegistry().notice: The address of the OpenSig user registry contract

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Not supported. This token is non-transferable.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Not supported. This token is non-transferable.
